resources.string: We need access to your approximate location in order to find available businessEntries in your area.\n\nPlease grant the permission and we\'ll start looking for nearby businessEntries.
Because we don\'t have access to your location right now, please provide your current postal code instead.
We\'re not quite sure what, though. Please let us know about this if restarting the app doesn\'t solve the issue.
Unfortunately our servers couldn\'t handle this request. We\'ll do our best to fix this soon.
We couldn\'t reach our servers, please make sure that you have a working internet connection.
Unfortunately we couldn\'t find any queue nearby. Why don\'t you let some people know that they can create a queue for free?
We can\'t figure out your approximate location, please make sure that your device has a network or GPS connection. Open Maps to trigger a location update.
